amendment.description: Amendment sought to propose adding a new section requiring a macroeconomic study on what the impact of not having long-term care insurance on the Federal, State and local governments might be before the CLASS Act would be repealed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to propose adding a new section requiring a study on the impact of not having long-term care insurance on the Federal, State and local governments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 263 (Roll no. 13).

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
